mapper.select: SELECT sto_no , sto_name , sto_tel , sto_loc , sto_photo , sto_comment , average_price , sto_thumbPhoto FROM STORE WHERE sto_gps_x between #{gps_x} - 0.01 AND #{gps_x} + 0.01 AND sto_gps_y between #{gps_y} - 0.01 and #{gps_y} + 0.01
SELECT sto_no , sto_name , sto_tel , sto_loc , sto_gps_x , sto_gps_y FROM STORE WHERE sto_no = #{sto_no}
SELECT menu_no , menu_name , menu_price , menu_check FROM menu WHERE menu_no_sto = #{sto_no} ORDER BY 4 DESC
SELECT tb_maxTable , tb_curTable FROM TB WHERE sto_no_tb = #{sto_no}
SELECT review.*, account.acc_name FROM review, account WHERE review_no_acc = acc_no AND review_no_sto = #{sto_no}
SELECT tag_name FROM HASHTAG WHERE tag_no_sto = #{tag_no_sto} GROUP BY tag_name ORDER BY count(tag_name) DESC LIMIT 3
